title: Famille d'accueil
overview: Located on the outskirts of Bordeaux, the Ferri√®re house sees a lot of people pass through, and for good reason: Marion is a family assistant and is regularly entrusted with children of all ages cared for by social services. With her husband Daniel and their own offspring, she tries to help them, whatever the problems they encounter, while having to manage her own family life, in which there is no shortage of adventures. Through the foster children, various social facts are addressed in this fiction full of good feelings.
